00022 /*
00023  * FILE Matrix.h
00024  * This is a very rough matrix library that has just enough functionality
00025  * to implement FitSNPGaussiansPriors3().
00026  */
00027 
00028 #ifndef _BIRDSEED_MATRIX_H
00029 #define _BIRDSEED_MATRIX_H
00030 
00031 //
00032 #include <cassert>
00033 #include <sstream>
00034 #include <vector>
00035 
00036 // uncomment below to get the assert statements back.
00037 // #define _MATRIX_DEBUG_ASSERT_ 1
00038 
00039 namespace birdseed
00040 {
00041 namespace dev
00042 {
00043     template<class T, int LEN>
00044     class FixedVector
00045     {
00046       public:
00047         typedef T value_type;
00048         enum {kLen = LEN};
00049 
00050         T m_data[LEN];
00051 
00052         FixedVector() {}
00053         FixedVector(size_t size)
00054         {
00055 #ifdef _MATRIX_DEBUG_ASSERT_
00056           assert(size == LEN);
00057 #endif
00058         }
00059         
00060         inline T &operator[](size_t i) 
00061         {
00062 #ifdef _MATRIX_DEBUG_ASSERT_
00063           assert(i < size());
00064 #endif
00065             return m_data[i];
00066         }
00067 
00068         inline const T &operator[](size_t i) const
00069         {
00070 #ifdef _MATRIX_DEBUG_ASSERT_
00071           assert(i < size());
00072 #endif
00073             return m_data[i];
00074         }
00075 
00076         inline size_t size() const 
00077         {
00078             return LEN;
00079         }
00080 
00081         // This is not really right, because the dimension of the output vector
00082         // is not the length of the input vector, but is the # of columns in the input matrix.
00083         template<class MATRIX>
00084         FixedVector operator*(const MATRIX &m) const
00085         {
00086             FixedVector ret;
00087 #ifdef _MATRIX_DEBUG_ASSERT_
00088             assert(this->size() == m.numRows());
00089             assert(ret.size() == m.numCols());
00090 #endif
00091             for (size_t i = 0; i < m.numCols(); ++i) {
00092                 typename MATRIX::value_type acc = 0;
00093                 for (size_t j = 0; j < this->size(); ++j) {
00094                     acc += (*this)[j] * m[j][i];
00095                 }
00096                 ret[i] = acc;
00097             }
00098             return ret;
00099         }
00100 
00101         inline value_type operator*(const FixedVector &other) const
00102         {
00103             value_type ret = 0;
00104             for (size_t i = 0; i < this->size(); ++i) {
00105                 ret += (*this)[i] * other[i];
00106             }
00107             return ret;
00108         }
00109         
00110         template<class VECTOR>
00111         FixedVector operator-(const VECTOR &other) const
00112         {
00113             FixedVector ret;
00114 #ifdef _MATRIX_DEBUG_ASSERT_
00115             assert(this->size() == other.size());
00116 #endif
00117             for (size_t i = 0; i < this->size(); ++i) {
00118                 ret[i] = (*this)[i] - other[i];
00119             }
00120             return ret;
00121         }
00122 
00123         inline FixedVector operator+(const FixedVector &other) const
00124         {
00125             FixedVector ret;
00126 #ifdef _MATRIX_DEBUG_ASSERT_
00127             assert(this->size() == other.size());
00128 #endif
00129             for (size_t i = 0; i < this->size(); ++i) {
00130                 ret[i] = (*this)[i] + other[i];
00131             }
00132             return ret;
00133         }
00134 
00135         inline FixedVector operator*(value_type scalar) const
00136         {
00137             FixedVector ret;
00138             for (size_t i = 0; i < this->size(); ++i) {
00139                 ret[i] = (*this)[i] * scalar;
00140             }
00141             return ret;
00142         }
00143 
00144         inline FixedVector operator-() const
00145         {
00146             FixedVector ret;
00147             for (size_t i = 0; i < this->size(); ++i) {
00148                 ret[i] = -((*this)[i]);
00149             }
00150             return ret;
00151         }
00152 
00153         inline FixedVector operator/(value_type scalar) const
00154         {
00155             FixedVector ret;
00156             for (size_t i = 0; i < this->size(); ++i) {
00157                 ret[i] = (*this)[i]/scalar;
00158             }
00159             return ret;
00160         }
00161 
00162         inline void setAllElements(value_type scalar) 
00163         {
00164             for (size_t i = 0; i < this->size(); ++i) {
00165                 (*this)[i] = scalar;
00166             }
00167         }
00168     };
00169     
00170 
00171     template<class T, int ROWS, int COLS>
00172     class FixedMatrix
00173     {
00174       public:
00175         typedef T value_type;
00176         typedef FixedVector<T, ROWS> ColumnType;
00177         typedef FixedVector<T, COLS> RowType;
00178         typedef RowType ROW;
00179         enum {kRows = ROWS, kCols = COLS};
00180         
00181         
00182         RowType m_data[ROWS];
00183 
00184         FixedMatrix() {}
00185         FixedMatrix(size_t len)
00186         {
00187 #ifdef _MATRIX_DEBUG_ASSERT_
00188           assert(len == ROWS);
00189 #endif
00190         }
00191 
00192         template<class MATRIX>
00193         FixedMatrix(const MATRIX &other)
00194         {
00195 #ifdef _MATRIX_DEBUG_ASSERT_
00196           assert(other.numRows() == ROWS);
00197           assert(other.numCols() == COLS);
00198 #endif
00199             for (size_t row = 0; row < other.numRows(); ++row) {
00200                 for (size_t col = 0; col < other.numCols(); ++col) {
00201                     (*this)[row][col] = other[row][col];
00202                 }
00203             }
00204         }
00205         
00206         inline RowType &operator[](size_t i)
00207         {
00208 #ifdef _MATRIX_DEBUG_ASSERT_
00209           assert(i < numRows());
00210 #endif
00211             return m_data[i];
00212         }
00213 
00214         inline const RowType &operator[](size_t i) const
00215         {
00216 #ifdef _MATRIX_DEBUG_ASSERT_
00217           assert(i < numRows());
00218 #endif
00219             return m_data[i];
00220         }
00221         
00222         inline size_t numRows() const 
00223         {
00224             return ROWS;
00225         }
00226 
00227         inline size_t numCols() const 
00228         {
00229             return COLS;
00230         }
00231 
00232         template<class VECTOR>
00233         ColumnType operator*(const VECTOR &v) const
00234         {
00235             ColumnType ret;
00236 #ifdef _MATRIX_DEBUG_ASSERT_
00237             assert(v.size() == this->numCols());
00238             assert(ret.size() == this->numRows());
00239 #endif
00240             for (size_t i = 0; i < this->numRows(); ++i) {
00241                 value_type acc = 0;
00242                 for (size_t j = 0; j < v.size(); ++j) {
00243                     acc += v[j] * (*this)[i][j];
00244                 }
00245                 ret[i] = acc;
00246             }
00247             return ret;
00248         }
00249 
00250         FixedMatrix operator*(const T mult) const
00251         {
00252             FixedMatrix ret;
00253             for (size_t row = 0; row < numRows(); ++row) {
00254                 for (size_t col = 0; col < numCols(); ++col) {
00255                     ret[row][col] = (*this)[row][col] * mult;
00256                 }
00257             }
00258             return ret;
00259         }
00260 
00261         template<class MATRIX>
00262         FixedMatrix operator-(const MATRIX &minus) const
00263         {
00264 #ifdef _MATRIX_DEBUG_ASSERT_
00265           assert(numRows() == minus.numRows());
00266           assert(numCols() == minus.numCols());
00267 #endif
00268             FixedMatrix ret;
00269             for (size_t row = 0; row < numRows(); ++row) {
00270                 for (size_t col = 0; col < numCols(); ++col) {
00271                     ret[row][col] = (*this)[row][col] - minus[row][col];
00272                 }
00273             }
00274             return ret;
00275         }
00276             
00277         template<class MATRIX>
00278         FixedMatrix operator+(const MATRIX &matrix2) const
00279         {
00280 #ifdef _MATRIX_DEBUG_ASSERT_
00281           assert(numRows() == matrix2.numRows());
00282           assert(numCols() == matrix2.numCols());
00283 #endif
00284             FixedMatrix ret;
00285             for (size_t row = 0; row < this->numRows(); ++row) {
00286                 for (size_t col = 0; col < this->numCols(); ++col) {
00287                     ret[row][col] = (*this)[row][col] + matrix2[row][col];
00288                 }
00289             }
00290             return ret;
00291         }
00292 
00293         
00294         ColumnType columnSlice(size_t col) const
00295         {
00296 #ifdef _MATRIX_DEBUG_ASSERT_
00297           assert(col < numCols());
00298 #endif
00299             ColumnType ret;
00300             for (size_t i = 0; i < numRows(); ++i) {
00301                 ret[i] = (*this)[i][col];
00302             }
00303             return ret;
00304         }
00305     };
00306 
00307     template<class T>
00308     class VarVector: public std::vector<T>
00309     {
00310       public:
00311         typedef std::vector<T> base_type;
00312         typedef typename base_type::value_type value_type;
00313         VarVector(size_t len):
00314             base_type(len)
00315         {}
00316         
00317         VarVector()
00318         {}
00319 
00320         inline T &operator[](size_t i)
00321         {
00322 #ifdef _MATRIX_DEBUG_ASSERT_
00323           assert(i < this->size());
00324 #endif
00325             return base_type::operator[](i);
00326         }
00327         
00328         inline const T &operator[](size_t i) const
00329         {
00330 #ifdef _MATRIX_DEBUG_ASSERT_
00331           assert(i < this->size());
00332 #endif
00333             return base_type::operator[](i);
00334         }
00335         
00336         inline VarVector operator*(value_type scalar) const
00337         {
00338             VarVector ret(this->size());
00339             for (size_t i = 0; i < this->size(); ++i) {
00340                 ret[i] = (*this)[i] * scalar;
00341             }
00342             return ret;
00343         }
00344 
00345         inline VarVector operator+(value_type scalar) const
00346         {
00347             VarVector ret(this->size());
00348             for (size_t i = 0; i < this->size(); ++i) {
00349                 ret[i] = (*this)[i] + scalar;
00350             }
00351             return ret;
00352         }
00353 
00354         template<class VECTOR>
00355         VarVector operator-(const VECTOR &other) const
00356         {
00357             VarVector ret(this->size());
00358 #ifdef _MATRIX_DEBUG_ASSERT_
00359             assert(this->size() == other.size());
00360 #endif
00361             for (size_t i = 0; i < this->size(); ++i) {
00362                 ret[i] = (*this)[i] - other[i];
00363             }
00364             return ret;
00365         }
00366 
00367         template<class VECTOR>
00368         VarVector operator+(const VECTOR &other) const
00369         {
00370             VarVector ret(this->size());
00371 #ifdef _MATRIX_DEBUG_ASSERT_
00372             assert(this->size() == other.size());
00373 #endif
00374             for (size_t i = 0; i < this->size(); ++i) {
00375                 ret[i] = (*this)[i] + other[i];
00376             }
00377             return ret;
00378         }
00379 
00380         template<class VECTOR>
00381         VarVector multiplyElementwise(const VECTOR &other) const
00382         {
00383             VarVector ret(this->size());
00384 #ifdef _MATRIX_DEBUG_ASSERT_
00385             assert(this->size() == other.size());
00386 #endif
00387             for (size_t i = 0; i < this->size(); ++i) {
00388                 ret[i] = (*this)[i] * other[i];
00389             }
00390             return ret;
00391         }
00392         template<class VECTOR>
00393         VarVector divideElementwise(const VECTOR &other) const
00394         {
00395             VarVector ret(this->size());
00396 #ifdef _MATRIX_DEBUG_ASSERT_
00397             assert(this->size() == other.size());
00398 #endif
00399             for (size_t i = 0; i < this->size(); ++i) {
00400                 ret[i] = (*this)[i] / other[i];
00401             }
00402             return ret;
00403         }
00404 
00405     };
00406     
00407     template<class T, int MAXLENGTH>
00408     class VarVectorWithReservedLength
00409     {
00410       public:
00411         enum{kMaxLength = MAXLENGTH};
00412         typedef T value_type;
00413 
00414         size_t m_len;
00415         T m_data[kMaxLength];
00416         
00417         VarVectorWithReservedLength(size_t len):
00418             m_len(len)
00419         {
00420 #ifdef _MATRIX_DEBUG_ASSERT_
00421           assert(len <= kMaxLength);
00422 #endif
00423         }
00424         
00425         inline T &operator[](size_t i)
00426         {
00427 #ifdef _MATRIX_DEBUG_ASSERT_
00428           assert(i < this->size());
00429 #endif
00430             return m_data[i];
00431         }
00432         
00433         inline const T &operator[](size_t i) const
00434         {
00435 #ifdef _MATRIX_DEBUG_ASSERT_
00436           assert(i < this->size());
00437 #endif
00438             return m_data[i];
00439         }
00440         
00441         inline VarVectorWithReservedLength operator*(value_type scalar) const
00442         {
00443             VarVectorWithReservedLength ret(this->size());
00444             for (size_t i = 0; i < this->size(); ++i) {
00445                 ret[i] = (*this)[i] * scalar;
00446             }
00447             return ret;
00448         }
00449 
00450         inline VarVectorWithReservedLength operator+(value_type scalar) const
00451         {
00452             VarVectorWithReservedLength ret(this->size());
00453             for (size_t i = 0; i < this->size(); ++i) {
00454                 ret[i] = (*this)[i] + scalar;
00455             }
00456             return ret;
00457         }
00458 
00459         template<class VECTOR>
00460         VarVectorWithReservedLength operator+(const VECTOR &other) const
00461         {
00462             VarVectorWithReservedLength ret(this->size());
00463             for (size_t i = 0; i < this->size(); ++i) {
00464                 ret[i] = (*this)[i] + other[i];
00465             }
00466             return ret;
00467         }
00468 
00469         template<class VECTOR>
00470         VarVectorWithReservedLength operator-(const VECTOR &other) const
00471         {
00472             VarVectorWithReservedLength ret(this->size());
00473 #ifdef _MATRIX_DEBUG_ASSERT_
00474             assert(this->size() == other.size());
00475 #endif
00476             for (size_t i = 0; i < this->size(); ++i) {
00477                 ret[i] = (*this)[i] - other[i];
00478             }
00479             return ret;
00480         }
00481 
00482         template<class VECTOR>
00483         VarVectorWithReservedLength multiplyElementwise(const VECTOR &other) const
00484         {
00485             VarVectorWithReservedLength ret(this->size());
00486 #ifdef _MATRIX_DEBUG_ASSERT_
00487             assert(this->size() == other.size());
00488 #endif
00489             for (size_t i = 0; i < this->size(); ++i) {
00490                 ret[i] = (*this)[i] * other[i];
00491             }
00492             return ret;
00493         }
00494         template<class VECTOR>
00495         VarVectorWithReservedLength divideElementwise(const VECTOR &other) const
00496         {
00497             VarVectorWithReservedLength ret(this->size());
00498 #ifdef _MATRIX_DEBUG_ASSERT_
00499             assert(this->size() == other.size());
00500 #endif
00501             for (size_t i = 0; i < this->size(); ++i) {
00502                 ret[i] = (*this)[i] / other[i];
00503             }
00504             return ret;
00505         }
00506 
00507         // Return a vector in which each element is val/this[i]
00508         inline VarVectorWithReservedLength divisor(T val) const
00509         {
00510             VarVectorWithReservedLength ret(this->size());
00511             for (size_t i = 0; i < this->size(); ++i) {
00512                 ret[i] = val/(*this)[i];
00513             }
00514             return ret;
00515         }
00516         
00517         inline void setAllElements(T val)
00518         {
00519             for (size_t i = 0; i < size(); ++i){
00520                 m_data[i] = val;
00521             }
00522         }
00523 
00524         inline size_t size() const
00525         {
00526             return m_len;
00527         }
00528 
00529         inline void resize(size_t newlen)
00530         {
00531 #ifdef _MATRIX_DEBUG_ASSERT_
00532           assert(newlen <= kMaxLength);
00533 #endif
00534             m_len = newlen;
00535         }
00536     };
00537     
00538     
00539     template<class T, int COLS>
00540     class VarMatrix
00541     {
00542       public:
00543         typedef T value_type;
00544         enum {kCols = COLS};
00545 
00546         typedef VarMatrix self;
00547         typedef FixedVector<T, COLS> ROW;
00548 
00549       private:
00550         std::vector<ROW> m_data;
00551 
00552       public:
00553 
00554         VarMatrix(size_t len):
00555             m_data(len)
00556         {
00557         }
00558 
00559         VarMatrix(size_t len, size_t reserve):
00560             m_data()
00561         {
00562             m_data.reserve(reserve);
00563             m_data.resize(len);
00564         }
00565 
00566         // To avoid picking up the template below if passing an int constant
00567         VarMatrix(int len):
00568             m_data(len)
00569         {
00570         }
00571 
00572         template<class MATRIX>
00573         VarMatrix(const MATRIX &other):
00574             m_data(other.numRows())
00575         {
00576 #ifdef _MATRIX_DEBUG_ASSERT_
00577           assert(other.numCols() == COLS);
00578 #endif
00579             for (size_t row = 0; row < other.numRows(); ++row) {
00580                 m_data[row] = other[row];
00581             }
00582         }
00583 
00584         template<class MATRIX>
00585         VarMatrix &operator=(const MATRIX &other)
00586         {
00587 #ifdef _MATRIX_DEBUG_ASSERT_
00588           assert(other.numCols() == COLS);
00589 #endif
00590             resize(other.numRows());
00591             for (size_t row = 0; row < other.numRows(); ++row) {
00592                 m_data[row] = other[row];
00593             }
00594         }
00595 
00596         inline ROW &operator[](size_t i)
00597         {
00598 #ifdef _MATRIX_DEBUG_ASSERT_
00599           assert(i < numRows());
00600 #endif
00601             return m_data[i];
00602         }
00603         
00604         inline const ROW &operator[](size_t i) const
00605         {
00606 #ifdef _MATRIX_DEBUG_ASSERT_
00607           assert(i < numRows());
00608 #endif
00609             return m_data[i];
00610         }
00611 
00612         inline size_t numRows() const 
00613         {
00614             return m_data.size();
00615         }
00616 
00617         inline size_t numCols() const 
00618         {
00619             return COLS;
00620         }
00621 
00622         inline VarMatrix operator*(const T mult) const
00623         {
00624             VarMatrix ret(numRows());
00625             for (size_t row = 0; row < numRows(); ++row) {
00626                 for (size_t col = 0; col < numCols(); ++col) {
00627                     ret[row][col] = (*this)[row][col] * mult;
00628                 }
00629             }
00630             return ret;
00631         }
00632 
00633         inline VarVector<T> columnSlice(size_t col) const
00634         {
00635 #ifdef _MATRIX_DEBUG_ASSERT_
00636           assert(col < numCols());
00637 #endif
00638             VarVector<T> ret(numRows());
00639             for (size_t i = 0; i < numRows(); ++i) {
00640                 ret[i] = (*this)[i][col];
00641             }
00642             return ret;
00643         }
00644 
00645         inline void resize(size_t newNumRows) 
00646         {
00647             m_data.resize(newNumRows);
00648         }
00649 
00650         inline void push_back(const ROW &row)
00651         {
00652             m_data.push_back(row);
00653         }
00654     };
00655 
00656     template<class T, int MAXROWS, int COLS>
00657     class VarMatrixWithReservedRows
00658     {
00659       public:
00660         typedef T value_type;
00661         enum {kMaxRows = MAXROWS, kCols = COLS};
00662 
00663         typedef VarMatrixWithReservedRows  self;
00664         typedef FixedVector<T, COLS> ROW;
00665 
00666       private:
00667         size_t m_len;
00668         ROW m_data[MAXROWS];
00669 
00670       public:
00671 
00672         VarMatrixWithReservedRows(size_t len):
00673             m_len(len),
00674             m_data()
00675         {
00676 #ifdef _MATRIX_DEBUG_ASSERT_
00677           assert(m_len <= kMaxRows);
00678 #endif
00679         }
00680 
00681         // To avoid picking up the template below if passing an int constant
00682         VarMatrixWithReservedRows(int len):
00683             m_len(len),
00684             m_data()
00685         {
00686 #ifdef _MATRIX_DEBUG_ASSERT_
00687           assert(m_len < kMaxRows);
00688 #endif
00689         }
00690 
00691         template<class MATRIX>
00692         VarMatrixWithReservedRows &operator=(const MATRIX &other)
00693         {
00694 #ifdef _MATRIX_DEBUG_ASSERT_
00695           assert(other.numCols() == COLS);
00696           assert(other.numRows() <= kMaxRows);
00697 #endif
00698             resize(other.numRows());
00699             for (size_t row = 0; row < other.numRows(); ++row) {
00700                 m_data[row] = other[row];
00701             }
00702             return *this;
00703         }
00704 
00705         inline ROW &operator[](size_t i)
00706         {
00707 #ifdef _MATRIX_DEBUG_ASSERT_
00708           assert(i < numRows());
00709 #endif
00710             return m_data[i];
00711         }
00712         
00713         inline const ROW &operator[](size_t i) const
00714         {
00715 #ifdef _MATRIX_DEBUG_ASSERT_
00716           assert(i < numRows());
00717 #endif
00718             return m_data[i];
00719         }
00720 
00721         inline size_t numRows() const 
00722         {
00723             return m_len;
00724         }
00725 
00726         inline size_t numCols() const 
00727         {
00728             return COLS;
00729         }
00730 
00731         inline VarMatrixWithReservedRows operator*(const T mult) const
00732         {
00733             VarMatrixWithReservedRows ret(numRows());
00734             for (size_t row = 0; row < numRows(); ++row) {
00735                 for (size_t col = 0; col < numCols(); ++col) {
00736                     ret[row][col] = (*this)[row][col] * mult;
00737                 }
00738             }
00739             return ret;
00740         }
00741 
00742         VarVectorWithReservedLength<T, MAXROWS> columnSlice(size_t col) const
00743         {
00744 #ifdef _MATRIX_DEBUG_ASSERT_
00745           assert(col < numCols());
00746 #endif
00747             VarVectorWithReservedLength<T, MAXROWS> ret(numRows());
00748             for (size_t i = 0; i < numRows(); ++i) {
00749                 ret[i] = (*this)[i][col];
00750             }
00751             return ret;
00752         }
00753 
00754         inline void resize(size_t newNumRows) 
00755         {
00756 #ifdef _MATRIX_DEBUG_ASSERT_
00757           assert(newNumRows <= kMaxRows);
00758 #endif
00759             m_len = newNumRows;
00760         }
00761 
00762         template<class MATRIX>
00763         VarMatrixWithReservedRows operator-(const MATRIX &minus) const
00764         {
00765 #ifdef _MATRIX_DEBUG_ASSERT_
00766           assert(numRows() == minus.numRows());
00767           assert(numCols() == minus.numCols());
00768 #endif
00769             VarMatrixWithReservedRows ret(numRows());
00770             for (size_t row = 0; row < numRows(); ++row) {
00771                 for (size_t col = 0; col < numCols(); ++col) {
00772                     ret[row][col] = (*this)[row][col] - minus[row][col];
00773                 }
00774             }
00775             return ret;
00776         }
00777     };
00778 
00779     template<class T>
00780     class VarVarMatrix
00781     {
00782       public:
00783         typedef T value_type;
00784         typedef VarVector<T> ROW;
00785 
00786       private:
00787         std::vector<ROW> m_data;
00788 
00789       public:
00790         VarVarMatrix(size_t rows, size_t cols)
00791         {
00792 #ifdef _MATRIX_DEBUG_ASSERT_
00793           assert(rows > 0);
00794           assert(cols > 0);
00795 #endif
00796             m_data.resize(rows);
00797             for (typename std::vector<ROW>::iterator it = m_data.begin();
00798                  it != m_data.end(); ++it) {
00799                 (*it).resize(cols);
00800             }
00801         }
00802         
00803         VarVarMatrix(size_t rows, size_t cols, T initializer)
00804         {
00805 #ifdef _MATRIX_DEBUG_ASSERT_
00806           assert(rows > 0);
00807           assert(cols > 0);
00808 #endif
00809             m_data.resize(rows);
00810             for (typename std::vector<ROW>::iterator it = m_data.begin();
00811                  it != m_data.end(); ++it) {
00812                 (*it).resize(cols, initializer);
00813             }
00814         }
00815 
00816         inline ROW &operator[](size_t i)
00817         {
00818 #ifdef _MATRIX_DEBUG_ASSERT_
00819           assert(i < numRows());
00820 #endif
00821             return m_data[i];
00822         }
00823         
00824         inline const ROW &operator[](size_t i) const
00825         {
00826 #ifdef _MATRIX_DEBUG_ASSERT_
00827           assert(i < numRows());
00828 #endif
00829             return m_data[i];
00830         }
00831 
00832         inline size_t numRows() const 
00833         {
00834             return m_data.size();
00835         }
00836 
00837         inline size_t numCols() const 
00838         {
00839             return m_data[0].size();
00840         }
00841 
00842         inline void resizeRows(size_t newrows)
00843         {
00844             m_data.resize(newrows);
00845         }
00846     };
00847     
00848     template<class MATRIX>
00849     typename MATRIX::value_type sumColumn(const MATRIX &matrix, size_t column)
00850     {
00851         typename MATRIX::value_type total = 0.0;
00852         for (size_t i = 0; i < matrix.numRows(); ++i) {
00853             total += matrix[i][column];
00854         }
00855         return total;
00856     }
00857 
00858     template<class MATRIX>
00859     typename MATRIX::value_type mean(const MATRIX &matrix, size_t column)
00860     {
00861         return sumColumn(matrix, column)/matrix.numRows();
00862     }
00863 
00864     template<class MATRIX>
00865     typename MATRIX::value_type variance(const MATRIX &matrix, typename MATRIX::value_type theMean, size_t column)
00866     {
00867         if (matrix.numRows() < 2) {
00868             return 1.0;
00869         }
00870 #ifdef _MATRIX_DEBUG_ASSERT_
00871         assert(matrix.numRows() > 1);
00872 #endif
00873         typename MATRIX::value_type acc = 0.0;
00874         for (size_t i = 0; i < matrix.numRows(); ++i) {
00875             acc += (matrix[i][column] - theMean) * (matrix[i][column] - theMean);
00876         }
00877         if (acc == 0.0) {
00878             return 1.0;
00879         }
00880         return acc / (matrix.numRows() - 1);
00881     }
00882 
00883     template<class MATRIX>
00884     typename MATRIX::value_type minInColumn(const MATRIX &matrix, size_t column) 
00885     {
00886 #ifdef _MATRIX_DEBUG_ASSERT_
00887       assert(matrix.numRows() > 0);
00888 #endif
00889         typename MATRIX::value_type theMin = matrix[0][column];
00890         for (size_t i = 1; i < matrix.numRows(); ++i) {
00891             theMin = min(theMin, matrix[i][column]);
00892         }
00893         return theMin;
00894     }
00895 
00896     template<class MATRIX>
00897     typename MATRIX::value_type maxInColumn(const MATRIX &matrix, size_t column) 
00898     {
00899 #ifdef _MATRIX_DEBUG_ASSERT_
00900       assert(matrix.numRows() > 0);
00901 #endif
00902         typename MATRIX::value_type theMax = matrix[0][column];
00903         for (size_t i = 1; i < matrix.numRows(); ++i) {
00904             theMax = max(theMax, matrix[i][column]);
00905         }
00906         return theMax;
00907     }
00908 
00909     template<class VECTOR>
00910     typename VECTOR::value_type sumVector(const VECTOR &vec)
00911     {
00912         typename VECTOR::value_type acc = 0;
00913         for (size_t i = 0; i < vec.size(); ++i) {
00914             acc += vec[i];
00915         }
00916         return acc;
00917     }
00918 
00919     template<class MATRIX>
00920     typename MATRIX::value_type sumRow(const MATRIX &matrix, size_t row)
00921     {
00922         return sumVector(matrix[row]);
00923         /*
00924         typename MATRIX::value_type total = 0.0;
00925         for (size_t i = 0; i < matrix.numCols(); ++i) {
00926             total += matrix[row][i];
00927         }
00928         return total;
00929         */
00930     }
00931     
00932     
00933     template<class VECTOR>
00934     typename VECTOR::value_type meanVector(const VECTOR &vec)
00935     {
00936         return sumVector(vec)/vec.size();
00937     }
00938 
00939     template<class VECTOR>
00940     typename VECTOR::value_type maxInVector(const VECTOR &vec) 
00941     {
00942 #ifdef _MATRIX_DEBUG_ASSERT_
00943       assert(vec.size() > 0);
00944 #endif
00945         typename VECTOR::value_type theMax = vec[0];
00946         for (size_t i = 1; i < vec.size(); ++i) {
00947             theMax = max(theMax, vec[i]);
00948         }
00949         return theMax;
00950     }
00951 
00952     template<class VECTOR>
00953     typename VECTOR::value_type minInVector(const VECTOR &vec) 
00954     {
00955 #ifdef _MATRIX_DEBUG_ASSERT_
00956       assert(vec.size() > 0);
00957 #endif
00958         typename VECTOR::value_type theMin = vec[0];
00959         for (size_t i = 1; i < vec.size(); ++i) {
00960             theMin = min(theMin, vec[i]);
00961         }
00962         return theMin;
00963     }
00964 
00965     template<class MATRIX>
00966     MATRIX maxMatrixElementwise(const MATRIX &matrix, typename MATRIX::value_type val)
00967     {
00968         MATRIX ret(matrix.numRows());
00969         for (size_t row = 0; row < matrix.numRows(); ++row) {
00970             for (size_t col = 0; col < matrix.numCols(); ++col) {
00971                 ret[row][col] = max(val, matrix[row][col]);
00972             }
00973         }
00974         return ret;
00975     }
00976 
00977     template<class VECTOR>
00978     std::string vectorToString(const VECTOR &vec)
00979     {
00980         std::stringstream strm;
00981         strm << "[";
00982         for (size_t i = 0; i < vec.size(); ++i) {
00983             if (i != 0) strm << ", ";
00984             strm << vec[i];
00985         }
00986         strm << "]";
00987         return strm.str();
00988     }
00989     
00990     
00991     template<class MATRIX>
00992     std::string matrixToString(const MATRIX &matrix)
00993     {
00994         std::stringstream strm;
00995         strm << "[";
00996         for (size_t row = 0; row < matrix.numRows(); ++row) {
00997             if (row > 0) {
00998                 strm << ", ";
00999             }
01000             strm << "[";
01001             for (size_t col = 0; col < matrix.numCols(); ++col) {
01002                 if (col > 0) {
01003                     strm << ", ";
01004                 }
01005                 strm << matrix[row][col];
01006             }
01007             strm << "]";
01008         }
01009         strm << "]";
01010         return strm.str();
01011     }
01012 };
01013 };
